title: Silva
description: Seasonal vegetarian restaurant and holiday home, located apprxo. 14km from Akureyri with a view of the mountains and fjord. Typically 3 daily changing meals plus gluten-free and vegan bread, smoothies, cakes, and biscuits. Children's play corner. Holds raw cooking workshops. Open for holiday home's guests for breakfast and dinner, otherwise from June-August only.
